member.name: T:WGetNET.WinGetConnector
member.summary: The WinGetConnector class offers methods to use winget.

member.name: P:WGetNET.WinGetConnector.WinGetInstalled
member.summary: Gets if winget is installed on the system

member.name: P:WGetNET.WinGetConnector.WinGetVersion
member.summary: Gets the number of the installed winget version
member.returns: The number of the installed winget version or a placeholder string if winget is not installed

member.name: M:WGetNET.WinGetConnector.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: M:WGetNET.WinGetConnector.SearchPackage(System.String)
member.summary: Uses the winget search function to search for a package that maches the given name
member.param: The name of the package that you want to search
member.returns: A List of packages that mached the search criteria

member.name: M:WGetNET.WinGetConnector.SearchPackageAsync(System.String)
member.summary: Uses the winget search function to search for a package that maches the given name
member.param: The name of the package that you want to search
member.returns: A Task object of the search task

member.name: M:WGetNET.WinGetConnector.InstallPackage(System.String)
member.param: The id or name of the package that should be installed
member.returns: True if the installation was successfull

member.name: M:WGetNET.WinGetConnector.InstallPackage(WGetNET.WinGetPackage)

member.name: M:WGetNET.WinGetConnector.InstallPackageAsync(WGetNET.WinGetPackage)
